text: Ladies and gentlemen, Time & Oak, the company that brought you the stick that enables you to customize, craft & finish your favorite whiskey in as little as 24 hours, is looking to do the same thing with wine and we at Uncorked have agreed to help them out. Join us tonight for a good ol’ fashioned Hackathon full of circuits, motors and yes… wine (how else are we going to define success!).
Event starts @ 6 and we’ll be wrapping up around 9
guys we need people for this hackathon. if you're not truly busy, please check in with rob to volunteer to help.
